title: Coast to Coast Radio Program! Commercial Free! Mar 3rd thru Mar
description:
Another seven broadcasts of the number one rated late night talk show in the entire world! Yes folks, C2C! Anyway, Download, SEED, and Enjoy! Thanks in advance to the seeders and those who spread these torrents all over the net. Well, until next week my friends. Stokeman Out......

Monday March 3rd, 2008
San Augustin UFO Crash
UFO Historian Art Campbell shared details about a UFO crash on the Plains of San Augustin, New Mexico which reportedly occurred the same time as the Roswell Incident in July 1947. Both episodes were likely due to the same air collision, he said, noting... 
Host: George Noory
Guest(s): Art Campbell, Michael E. Salla

Tuesday March 4th, 2008
Dire Web Bot Predictions
George Ure and his colleague &#039;Cliff&#039; shared their web bot predictions about America and global events. Their method captures changes in language patterns within Internet discussions. This aggregated data is then processed with software to determine various... 
Host: George Noory
Guest(s): Cliff, George Ure, James McCanney, John M. Curtis

Wednesday March 5th, 2008
OBEs: The Benefits of Astral Travel
Speaker and author William Buhlman discussed the latest research on out-of-body experiences (OBEs). During these experiences a person moves into an astral realm-- a dimension of existence apart from the physical world. There are many benefits that can... 
Host: George Noory
Guest(s): William Buhlman, Gerald Celente

Thursday March 6th, 2008
Lizard Man, Reptoids, & Mutilations
&#039;Cryptohunter&#039; John Rhodes reported on recent and past Lizard Man accounts, Reptoids, and connections between MRSA and animal mutilations. A new South Carolina case bore similarities to a 1988 &#039;Lizard Man&#039; incident in which a car was vandalized with... 
Host: George Noory
Guest(s): John Rhodes, Douglas Hagmann

Friday March 7th, 2008
Trilogy Hotline Night
During Open Lines, George offered a different special topic line each hour. A caller to the &#039;I&#039;ve got a secret&#039; hotline confessed to stabbing one of two attackers who tried to rob him at knife-point in a restroom at a dance club in Tijuana, Mexico. The... 
Host: George Noory
Guest(s): Open Lines, Ellen Whitehurst

Saturday March 8th, 2008
The Lost Ark of the Covenant
Professor Tudor Parfitt discussed his new book, The Lost Ark of the Covenant, in which he recounts his real-life quest to recover the 2,500 year old biblical artifact. Full recap to follow...
Host: Ian Punnett
Guest(s): Tudor Parfitt, Dr. James Richardson

Sunday March 9th, 2008
The Power of Alpha Waves
Psychologist Dr. Jim Hardt joined the program to discuss his work mapping the brain and how it correlates with advanced spiritual states and moods. He also shared methods to increase the highly desirable alpha brain waves. Hardt stressed the significance...
Host: Ian Punnett
Guest(s): Jim Hardt
